data.name: Diesel Brothers: Truck Building Simulator - Garage Tunes (Soundtrack)
data.detailed_description:
What's up, America!
You're listening to the greatest music on the trucking planet.

The official soundtrack includes radio jingles by the Diesel Brothers crew themselves and songs from the game.

Track list:
1. Swamp Horizon FM Jingle
2. Listen
3. Mock the Afflicted
4. Tracing My Steps
5. Neighbourhood Girl
6. D Rocker Radio Jingle
7. Energy
8. Seven Eleven
9. World Traveller
10. Find The Car
11. Diesel-Jazzel Jingle
12. Jazzy Sax, Guitar and Organ At The Club
13. Winter Walk (Silver Trumpet Mix)
14. Guitar & Saxophone
15. Pushin' Daisies
16. DRP 67.207 FM Jingle
17. Goldberg Variations BWV 988 - Variatio 1 a 1 Clav.
18. Overture to The Marriage of Figaro
19. Violin Concerto in D, Opus 61: 3. Rondo
20. Mozart/Liszt: Lacrymosa from "Requiem"

The songs are presented in lossless .wav (16bit/44.1kHz) and high qality .mp3 (320 kbps).

data.short_description: Make your garage resonate with awesome tracks from the game. Radio jingles by the Diesel Brothers crew themselves!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer. Doesn't support Mac OS.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer. Doesn't support Mac OS.
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970 8GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
